snippet: Despite moving more than 1,000 miles from Boston, an ex-mob boss remained an ardent supporter of the New England Patriots while in witness protection....
lead_paragraph: Despite moving more than 1,000 miles from Boston, an ex-mob boss remained an ardent supporter of the New England Patriots while in witness protection.

headline.main: Ex-New England Mob Boss Remained a Patriots Fan in Hiding
headline.print_headline: Ex-New England Mob Boss Remained a Patriots Fan in Hiding
